quests.title: Welcome to Elden
quests.description: Learn the basics of survival in this new world.
quests.long_description: As a newly arrived adventurer in Elden, you must familiarize yourself with the town and its people to begin your journey.

narrative.hook: Welcome to Elden, brave adventurer! I'm Marcus, town guard. Let me show you the basics of survival.
narrative.background: Every successful adventurer starts by understanding their surroundings and building relationships with the locals.
narrative.stakes: Knowledge of the town could mean the difference between life and death in your adventures.
narrative.resolution: Well done! You're ready to take on greater challenges. The world awaits!

objectives.description: Speak with Sarah at the Inn

quests.title: The Missing Merchant
quests.description: A merchant has gone missing on the forest road. Investigate their disappearance.
quests.long_description: Elena's trading partner was supposed to arrive days ago but never showed up. She suspects foul play and needs someone to investigate the forest road.

narrative.hook: My trading partner should have been here days ago. Something terrible must have happened on the forest road.
narrative.background: The forest paths have been dangerous lately, with reports of bandits and worse creatures.
narrative.stakes: If we can't secure the trade routes, Elden's economy will suffer greatly.
narrative.resolution: Thank you for uncovering the truth. The roads are safer now, and we can resume trade.

objectives.description: Search the forest road for clues

quests.title: Ancient Magic Awakening
quests.description: Strange magical energies are disrupting the land. The court wizard needs your help investigating.
quests.long_description: Aldric, the court wizard, has detected powerful magical disturbances emanating from the ancient ruins. This could be connected to the recent increase in monster activity.

narrative.hook: The magical energies I've been sensing grow stronger each day. Something ancient stirs in the old ruins.
narrative.background: Long ago, powerful mages built these ruins to contain dangerous magical forces. Their seals may be weakening.
narrative.stakes: If the ancient seals fail completely, the magical chaos could consume the entire region.
narrative.resolution: Your bravery has prevented a magical catastrophe. The realm owes you a great debt.

objectives.description: Gather 3 Mana Crystals from magical creatures
Use the Sealing Crystal on the Ancient Seal

quests.title: Daily Herb Collection
quests.description: Collect healing herbs for the town's medical supplies.

narrative.hook: I need fresh healing herbs for my potions. The forest always provides.
narrative.background: Daily herb collection ensures we have enough supplies for injured adventurers.
narrative.stakes: Without fresh herbs, our healing potions lose their potency.
narrative.resolution: Perfect! These herbs will make excellent healing draughts.

quests.title: Wolf Pack Menace
quests.description: A large wolf pack is threatening travelers on the northern road.

narrative.hook: A massive wolf pack has claimed the northern road as their territory. Travelers are too frightened to pass.
narrative.background: These wolves are larger and more aggressive than normal - something has made them desperate.
narrative.stakes: Trade with northern settlements will cease if the road remains blocked.
narrative.resolution: The road is clear! Travelers can once again pass safely to the north.

quests.title: The Blacksmith's Apprentice
quests.description: Help Thorin the blacksmith with a special commission.

narrative.hook: I've got a special commission, but I need rare materials. Think ye can help an old smith?
narrative.background: A visiting noble has commissioned a masterwork blade, but the materials are hard to come by.
narrative.stakes: This commission could establish my reputation throughout the kingdom.
narrative.resolution: Magnificent work! This blade will be the finest I've ever forged. Here's yer reward!

objectives.description: Find Iron Ore in the mountains
